Description:
KPMG Workbench, developed with Microsoft, is an AI platform transforming enterprise service delivery through automation. Utilizing Microsoft Foundry, it manages 50+ AI agents, scalable to thousands, helping ensure secure, compliant, and interoperable approaches in tax, audit, and advisory fields. The platform integrates the firmâ€™s industry expertise into digital interactions. Explore how KPMG elevates service delivery with Workbench and how your organization can benefit.
